sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <cus-page-title-back v-if="Mark !== 'pd'" :isDialog="true" :label="$t('pdgenlPaRule.paRuleSelect')" @backTo="back"/>
    <cus-page-title-back v-if="Mark === 'pd'" :isDialog="true" :label="$t('pdgenlPaRule.paRuleAssociate')"
                         @backTo="back"/>

    <el-form ref="searchForm" :model="params" label-width="auto">
      <cus-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('pdgenlPaInfo.designationSecurityProject')"
                        prop="eq_paId">
            <el-select v-model="params.eq_paId" :placeholder="$t('form.please_select')" clearable filterable>
              <el-option v-for="item in paOptions" :key="item.id"
                         :label="item.pdPaCode + ':' + item.pdPaName + (item.pdAttr==='1'?' - '+$t('pdgenlPaRule.personalInsurance'):' - '+$t('pdgenlPaRule.groupInsurance'))"
                         :value="item.id"></el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdRuleDtCls')" prop="pdRuleDtCls">
            <cus-select v-model="params.pdRuleDtCls" codetype="ruleBusinessDetailClass" disabled></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdRuleCode')" prop="like_pdRuleCode">
            <el-input v-model="params.like_pdRuleCode" :placeholder="$t('pay_def.message.please_enter')"
                      clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </cus-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col style="text-align: right">
          <el-button icon="el-icon-search" size="small" type="primary" @click="$refs.page.reload()">
            {{ $t('pdgenlCmpnInfo.search') }}
          </el-button>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('pdgenlPaInfo.ppRule')"></cus-table-title>
    <el-table :data="tableData" :span="8" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row size="mini"
              @selection-change="handleSelectionChange">
      <el-table-column type="selection" width="50"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdgenlPaInfo.details')" align="center" width="80">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showRule(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pdgenlPaInfo.securityProject')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdPaCode"
                       sortable>
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.pdPaCode ? scope.row.pdPaCode + ':' + scope.row.pdPaName + (scope.row.pdAttr === '1' ? ' - ' + $t('pdgenlPaRule.personalInsurance') : ' - ' + $t('pdgenlPaRule.groupInsurance')) : ''
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdRuleDtCls')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdRuleDtCls">
        <template v-slot="scope">{{ scope.row.pdRuleDtCls | filter_ruleBussModuDeta }}</template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdRuleCode')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdRuleCode"
                       sortable></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdRuleDesc')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdRuleDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="tableData" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5" :params="params"
                    :url="Mark === 'pd' ? '/pd-po-info/base/selectRules' : '/pd-pa-info-general/selectRules'"/>

    <el-row style="text-align: right" type="flex">
      <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
      <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
      <el-col :span="8">
        <el-button icon="el-icon-connection" size="small" type="primary" @click="associate">
          {{ $t('pdgenlPaInfo.select') }}
        </el-button>
      </el-col>
    </el-row>

    <!-- 规则查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="ruleView.flag" :performType="ruleView.performType" :ruleCode="ruleView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'1'" :visible="ruleView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>

import {connectionRule, getAllPa} from "@/api/basicinfo/pdgenlPaInfo"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'pdgenlPaRule',
  props: {
    pdPaInfo: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    },
    pdRuleDtCls: {
      type: String,
      required: true,
      default: ''
    },
    Mark: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: ''
    },
    markRule: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: ''
    }
  },
  filters: {
    filter_ruleBussModuDeta(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  watch: {
    tableData() {
      this.filters_pdCode = []
      this.tableData.forEach(val => {
        if (!this._.includes(this._.map(this.filters_pdCode, 'value'), val.pdCode)) {
          this.filters_pdCode.push({
            text: val.pdCode + ':' + val.pdName,
            value: val.pdCode
          })
        }
      })
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      filters_pdCode: [],
      ruleView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      },
      paOptions: [],
      tableData: [],
      selectedRules: [],
      pdPaCode: '',
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        like_pdRuleCode: '',
        productDetailType: '',
        pdRuleDtCls: '',
        current_pdPaInfo: this.pdPaInfo,
        eq_paId: undefined,
        Mark: ''
      },
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      }
    }
  },
  created() {
    if (this.Mark === 'pd') {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        this.product = pdtempPdInfo
        this.params.product = pdtempPdInfo
        this.params.Mark = this.Mark
        this.params.productDetailType = this.product.cType
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
        return
      }
    }
    // 初始化指定保全项目下拉
    this.queryAllPa()
    this.params.pdRuleDtCls = this.pdRuleDtCls
  },
  methods: {
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.ruleView.visible = false
    },
    queryAllPa() {
      getAllPa().then(res => {
        this.paOptions = res.data
      })
    },
    showRule(row) {
      this.ruleView.flag = '1'
      this.ruleView.ruleCode = row.pdRuleCode
      this.ruleView.performType = row.performType
      this.ruleView.visible = true
    },
    associate() {
      if (this.selectedRules.length === 0) {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('pdgenlPaRule.pleaseSelectRule'))
        return
      }
      let map = {
        "ruleType": '1',
        "Mark": this.Mark,
        "pdInfo": this.product,
        "pdBussDetailType": this.pdRuleDtCls,
        "pdgenlPdPaInfo": this.pdPaInfo,
        "pdtempPdPaInfoVo": this.pdPaInfo,
        "pdtempPdRulesVoList": this.selectedRules
      }
      connectionRule(this.buildRequestData(map)).then(() => {
        this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
        this.$refs.page.reload()
      })
    },
    // 规则动态表格多选框
    handleSelectionChange(val) {
      this.selectedRules = val
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('closeDialogRule')
    }
  }
}
</script>
